clubOnAir.name: Bays Mountain VHF (Primary)
clubOnAir.frequency: 146.970 MHz (-0.6 MHz offset) PL 123.0 Hz PL Tone
clubOnAir.mode: Analog or Yaesu System Fusion (C4FM) Input / Analog Only Output
features: Primary club machine for meetings and the Sunday net
clubOnAir.notes: Coverage across the whole Tri-Cities area, including Kingsport, Johnson City, and Bristol. Supports both analog FM and Yaesu System Fusion (C4FM) digital modes as input, will only output analog FM.

clubOnAir.name: UHF #1
clubOnAir.frequency: 443.325 MHz (+5.0 MHz offset) PL 123.0 Hz PL Tone
clubOnAir.mode: Automatic Mode Select (AMS) for Yaesu System Fusion (C4FM) and Analog FM
features: Supports both analog FM and Yaesu System Fusion (C4FM) digital modes as input and output

clubOnAir.name: UHF #2
clubOnAir.notes: This repeater will be used for digital including Wires-X coming soon.
